lines.text: My name is Irene, and I'm your great-great grandmother.
I haven't got a great-great-great-great-grate-great grandmother.

[laughs]
I'm not as great as all that.
Let me give you a kiss to thank you.

[surprised]
A kiss!
[they lean in]
Princess Irene what are you doing?
Princess! You never told me you where a princess!
You didn't ask.
Are you a ghost?
No, but I'm not real, either.
Are you some sort of... magic, then?

[to Irene]
There will come a time when you won't need me because you will have found your own magic.
She's here somewhere. She... she's just invisible at the moment.
Your grandmother is invisible?
Yes. But she is here, I know she is.
Look, I'm glad you rescued me, but I dont' have time to play games.
This isn't a game!
No, it's dead serious. The goblins have a plan and you're a part of it. We can't waste our time with invisible grandmothers.
You don't believe me, do you.
Well... I...
But I thought we were friends.
Those goblins aren't so bad if you know how to deal with 'em.
But they were horrible!
I guess they are a little creepy, but you shouldn't run away; you have to face 'em and sing! Of course, singing doesn't always work down there...
Down where?
Underground, in the mines.
The mines?
where my father works. Don't they teach you anything in that castle of yours?
Of course they do; reading, writing, arithmetic...
Arithmetic? Great; that'll work against the goblins. At least you'll be able to count them.
You mustn't do that, you know what Looti's like. She's always worrying about straaaange stings.

[somewhere else]
Straaaaange things. You never know when they might happen.
Oh these steps.
[gasp]
That's the trouble with castles
[wheeze]
there's too many blooming steps
[gasp]
Goblins? Pets?
Sure, everyone knows about the goblins and their pets... except people from the castle.
Oh.
You're from the castle right?
Yes.
And you don't know the way back.
No.
Typical. Alright follow me.
I will make them eat the dirt from under my fingernails!
It's a village - a goblin village! That must be where the goblins live.
